alert.note: Alert for Eastern Uinta Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 2:52PM MST until March 09 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow gradually ending with additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches, bringing total snow accumulations to 4 to 8 inches. * WHERE...Eastern Uinta Mountains, including U.S. Highway 191. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and reduced visibility. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
